trans-unit.source: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato per creare un segnaposto ogni volta che l'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*>restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part fornisce un meccanismo di autorizzazione per determinare se le singole <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli possono essere aggiunti a una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori possono facoltativamente assegnare una stringa arbitraria per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>proprietà in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo viene aggiunta di controlli a una pagina, viene controllato il valore del filtro ai criteri impostati dallo sviluppatore, con la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>metodo e restituisce `false` se un controllo non è autorizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones, because these controls are wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, and this object inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo meccanismo funziona anche con i controlli server e utente che vengono inseriti in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>aree, in quanto questi controlli sono inclusi in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>oggetto in fase di esecuzione e questo oggetto eredita le <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not authorized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control inserts an UnauthorizedWebPart control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo non è autorizzato, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>eredita un controllo UnauthorizedWebPart nell'albero di controllo della pagina al posto del controllo non autorizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An UnauthorizedWebPart control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control from being lost.
trans-unit.target: Riserva la posizione del controllo non autorizzato nella pagina un controllo UnauthorizedWebPart nella struttura di controllo e impedisce che eventuali dati di personalizzazione che un utente che sia stato applicato in precedenza il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo vengono persi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo UnauthorizedWebPart non viene mai visualizzato in una pagina in cui viene inserito, né appare nel codice sorgente per la pagina viene eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori è possono verificare la presenza nella struttura di controllo pagina controllando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref> control, called when a static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"> </xref> controllo, viene chiamato quando un valore statico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo (o controllo server o utente) non riceve l'autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore UnauthorizedWebPart accetta un controllo statico `webPart` come parametro, in cui `webPart` una verifica di autorizzazione non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo statico è una variabile dichiarata nel markup della pagina Web, anziché da aggiungere a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore restituisce una nuova istanza di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>controllo, che viene aggiunto alla struttura ad albero di controlli della pagina al posto di `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has failed to be authorized by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che non è riuscito a essere autorizzata dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref> control, called when a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"> </xref> controllo, viene chiamato quando un dinamico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo (o controllo server o utente) non riceve l'autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor is called when a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control fails its authorization check.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore UnauthorizedWebPart viene chiamato quando un dinamico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o altro controllo server non riceve l'autorizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo dinamico è che viene aggiunto a una pagina a livello di programmazione, o da un utente da un catalogo di Web part di controlli.

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore UnauthorizedWebPart restituisce una nuova istanza di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>controllo per sostituire il controllo dinamico non autorizzate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to participate in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID del controllo server o utente originale che è stato aggiunto a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> deve far parte di un'applicazione Web part.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the original control's type.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il nome del tipo del controllo originale.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il percorso virtuale relativo al controllo utente, se il controllo originale è un controllo utente.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control that wraps the original server or user control.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa contenente l'ID del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> controllo che include il controllo server o utente originale.
